full_sentence: Well for a start they arrive the hospital's emergency room in pain, and the poor doctors are happy treating them for free if needed. Just because they cannot describe their pain any further than "my tummy hurts" doesn’t mean that their mother ismaking them do it to sell the drugs 10 for $10 per pill. Why don't they deserve to do as well as us healthwise?
